name: Evidence
title: evidence.dev
shortDescription: Evidence is a lightweight framework designed for building data-driven applications using SQL. It's tailored for data professionals and developers seeking to create polished data products efficiently. An example use case involves a company like Lenstra, which has utilized Evidence to build all its reporting, demonstrating its effectiveness in real-world data management and visualization.
pros: Supports integration with existing data stacks
cons: Limited community compared to larger frameworks
Potentially less features than full-fledged BI tools

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Tableau
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Rich visualization and large user community

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: PowerBI
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong analytics with extensive Microsoft integration
